p: Environmental and bathymetric data, with resolutions of 5 and 1 arcminute, were obtained from the Bio-Oracle ( Tyberghein et al., 2012) dataset and the ETOPO1 Global Relief Model, respectively ( Amante & Eakins, 2009). Twenty-seven layers of environmental data and their transformations available on the Bio-Oracle dataset were used in the analyses ( Table 1). Each layer was cropped using ArcGIS 10.2 to only include areas within 2 m altitude and 100 m depth.
